column4: I need a good app for writing algebraic formulae out. Any suggestions?
It's a markup language, not a program per se
Ah. Well I just need to write em and save em as images, really....
You can do that with Latex but it might be more complicated than you need... How many equations are you writing?
Quite a few. I'm doing some maths coursework, and I just need to write out stuff in a clear format, rather than using say (blahblahblah/blahblahblah)... use two lines, instead of the /, see?
What document format are you writing in currently?
Just an office document. Probably save using the OOo format. I can just take screenshots and import them as images...
I don't know what country you're from, but I'm from the UK and studying for GCSEs. I'm 15. Just to give you a kind of judge of what level I'm working at.
Thanks, that helps. I OO has an equation editor that should be sufficient for you
If you need GIFs for some reason you can use that webapp I linked to previously.
Ah! Okay! Thanks so much for all the help!
